item.title: Latexdiff in Mac OSX
item.description:
(Warning) The following procedure only worked with Ubuntu and Mac OSX.

(Warning) Latexdiff from MacTeX did not work with unknown reason.

To make error free, make sure you do this:

  1. Your old and new files must exist in separate folders. Those separate folders must have all the necessary files, such as *.aux
item.dc:creator: S.-H. Dan Shim

item.title: How to start a blog with Jupyter notebook
item.description:
My blog was setup and started with the instruction in: https://www.dataquest.io/blog/how-to-setup-a-data-science-blog/

Normal workflow for a blog posting.

  • Switch to the main blog folder.

  • Run pelican content to generate the HTML.

  • Switch to the output directory.

  • Run python -m pelican.server.

  • Visit localhost:8000 in a browser to preview.

  • Move back to the main blog folder.

  • Run pelican content -s pelicanconf.py
item.dc:creator: S.-H. Dan Shim
